content: i m falling in love with wall hangings -- they don t take up much yarn or a ton of time to make but you end up with a beautiful decor piece to pretty up your home business or anywhere else that could use a handmade touch the welcome wall hanging is a great intro to these types of projects thanks to its limited colors and simple instructions the flower pattern is included too but you can also opt to complete the o in bobble stitches if you prefer
